title: Reports of Cases Decided in the Court of Appeals of the State of Georgia

first-renewed-issue.issue-date: March and October terms 1927 and March term 1928

additional-notes: Volumes of this law reporter are renewed as books, rather than as periodicals.

Copyrights to a number of these volumes of judicial decisions are claimed by the state of Georgia as work for hire.  Per the Supreme Court opinion in Georgia vs. Public.resource.org (2020) such works might not be copyrightable.
